cases.question: Summarise the key milestones and risks for Acme Corporation's acquisition of Beacon Analytics.
cases.context: Board minutes, diligence memos, and regulator correspondence outline a four-month closing window with integration dependencies tied to the Beacon data warehouse.

documents.title: Acme Board Approval — 12 January 2023
snippets: Board unanimously approves Beacon Analytics acquisition contingent on privacy remediation by 31 March 2023.
Legal flagged need for SEC Form 8-K within four business days.

documents.title: Beacon Integration Memo — 24 February 2023
snippets: Data warehouse migration requires dual-run from 1 April through 30 April; customer consent refresh queued for mid-March.
Risk log notes outstanding DPIA for EU data subjects.

documents.title: FTC Comment Letter — 15 March 2023
snippets: FTC requests confirmation that Beacon data minimisation controls align with prior consent decree.

cases.question: Describe expected financial synergies, integration checkpoints, and outstanding risks for the Acme/Beacon merger.
cases.context: Finance integration working group documented synergy targets and dependencies on unified analytics access while compliance logged open DPIA tasks.

documents.title: Synergy Forecast — 20 February 2023
snippets: Run-rate savings of $12M annually contingent on cloud vendor consolidation by Q4 2023.
Customer churn mitigation requires joint success team in place by 1 May 2023.

documents.title: Compliance Risk Register — 02 March 2023
snippets: Outstanding DPIA for Beacon EU data flagged as high severity; remediation owner assigned to Privacy Office.
Privileged legal memo referenced but not attached.
